modShortDescription: Adds more pots to the world by adding them as a specific item to cupboards.
modDescription:
Adds more pots to the world by adding them as a specific item to cupboards. It is unrealistic with multi-burner stoves to think everyone cleared out most/all their pots and pans as the world ended.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/RELXIX-7DTD/A20_XML_Modlets/tree/main/RELXIX_Loot_MorePots)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/25785-relxix-a20-xml-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Red Eagle LXIX](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/red-eagle-lxix/)
